questions.question: Is the image formatted as a digital character card with a defined rectangular frame and structured layout resembling an RPG collectible?
questions.explanation: Image B features a clear rectangular frame that resembles the design of a digital character card, commonly seen in RPG collectibles. The structured layout includes labeled stats and categorized sections typical of such designs.

questions.question: Does the poodle wear a white, layered couture dress and a visible heart-shaped pendant around its neck?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the poodle is adorned with a layered white dress that fits the description of couture fashion. A distinct heart-shaped pendant is clearly visible around its neck, accentuating the overall glamorous appearance.

questions.question: Is the poodle rendered in a 3D cartoon style with exaggerated fluffy fur, smooth textures, and stylized lighting?
questions.explanation: The poodle in Image B appears to be rendered in a 3D cartoon style, characterized by fluffy fur exaggerated in volume, smooth textures, and lighting that emphasizes stylized elements typical of animated characters.

questions.question: Are the following stat bars present and correctly labeled: [Elegance +10], [Agility +8], [Charisma +9], [Fashion Sense +10]?
questions.explanation: Image B clearly displays the stat bars labeled as [Elegance +10], [Agility +8], [Charisma +9], [Fashion Sense +10]. These bars are part of the card format, representing attributes commonly assessed in character profiles.

questions.question: Is there a gilded banner at the top of the card and a silver nameplate at the bottom displaying the class “Glamour Bard”?
questions.explanation: A gilded banner at the top of Image B indicates the character title 'Opera Duchess', and a silver nameplate at the bottom displays the class 'Glamour Bard', common elements in card designs for character classes and titles.

questions.question: Does the card have a beveled metallic border around its edges?
questions.explanation: Image B showcases a beveled metallic border around its edges, contributing to the stylized, collectible card appearance typically reinforced by such design elements.

questions.question: Is the background a stylized harbor scene featuring a recognizable depiction of the Sydney Opera House?
questions.explanation: The background in Image B consists of a stylized harbor scene with a clearly identifiable depiction of the Sydney Opera House, helping set the geographical context and enhancing the card's thematic design.
